comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4017172482/] Mrs. Haviland H. Lund is the head of the Forward-to-the-Land League which ... Mrs. Lund advises city men to go to the suburbs and cultivate a piece of land ... Source: The Hartford Courant ; August 21, 1913 I added her to Wikipedia and will change her name when I find her maiden name: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mrs._Haviland_H._Lund
